name: Obnoxious Sweeper
description:
This game is inspired by the classic game Mine Sweeper. It was made for Brackey's game jam 2022.2, where the theme was "You're not alone". So this time, you are not alone and chaos ensues.

How to play
  • Left click on a square to reveal what's beneath.
  • If you hit a mine, you lose. 
  • The other cells show exactly how many mines are located in the 8 adjacent cells.
  •  With this information you can deduce where the mines must be placed.
  • Right click on a square where you believe there is a mine, to flag it.
  • You win when all non-mine cells are revealed!

If you need to practice the basic game before trying our version, you can do so here (a site we are not affiliated with in any way).

  • We used the font Style-7 (http://www.styleseven.com) by Sizenko Alexander
